title: @Lyte Can I have chatlogs for these ranked restrictions please?
body:
Yesterday I was ranked restricted for 3 games, which I completed and I had not said a single thing in chat since then and I have had my restriction extended for 3 more games.

Here is the VoD in which the original restriction started: http://www.twitch.tv/lol_iseestars/b/586489754 (Skip to 2:31:35 for the initial restriction)

Here is the VoD in which I have had my ban extended http://www.twitch.tv/lol_iseestars/c/5460510 (Skip to 4:28:20 for the extended restriction)

Every game I played since the restriction is in these VoDs. You can check my match history here to account for the games: http://www.lolking.net/summoner/na/60627515#matches

I did not do anything negative in game, and I did not say anything at all in chat. People are telling me I have just been rebanned for previous games before the initial chat restriction.

Can I please have the chat logs for both of these restrictions please?

Thank you

replies.body: I've seen you post this twice now, they do the bans and chat restrictions on a weekly basis. So whatever you got ranked restricted for will not be on your stream, its gonna be something from last week that you did. You're gonna have time to play on the 11th, you're gonna get ranked rewards, suck it up. Others arent getting anything for this season, on top of that, 2 weeks of ban time. Consider yourself lucky

> I've seen you post this twice now, they do the bans and chat restrictions on a weekly basis. So whatever you got ranked restricted for will not be on your stream, its gonna be something from last week that you did. You're gonna have time to play on the 11th, you're gonna get ranked rewards, suck it up. Others arent getting anything for this season, on top of that, 2 weeks of ban time. Consider yourself lucky

Actually what happened was I didn't know I had to win those 3 games, my ban wasn't extended.

Just let the thread die, I'm stupid.
